18 Jul 2025

Think Like a Business Tycoon: Strategy That Scales

From startup hustle to Fortune 500 finesse, these reads break down the tools, tactics, and thinking that separate leaders from the rest. If you want to scale smarter, start here. These titles will stretch how you think about growth, leadership, and competitive edge.

Genwise

by LJ Reitman

Release Date: June 30, 2025

If something happened to you today, would your family know what to do? Most families don’t. That’s why Genwise exists — to prevent confusion, chaos, and painful guesswork during one of life’s most difficult moments. Genwise helps you organize every critical piece of information your loved ones would need if something happened to you.

Buy on Amazon

The Entrepreneurs: What They Didn’t Teach You in Business School

by Rick VanderHorst

Release Date: June 26, 2025

Number # 1 best-selling author, entrepreneur, and philanthropist, Rick VanderHorst, imparts wisdom and insights for our dynamic and fast-changing business environment. With technological and AI advancements, horizontal organizational management structures, and the exploding gig economy, more and more people find themselves looking to start their own businesses.

Buy on Amazon

Law Firm Leads: The Lawyer’s Guide to Turning Clicks into Clients

by Braden Pollock

Release Date: July 16, 2025

In today’s competitive legal landscape, waiting for referrals isn’t enough. The Law Firm Leads pulls back the curtain on the modern world of online lead generation and shows attorneys how to turn digital inquiries into real clients. Written by industry veteran Braden Pollock—founder of Legal Brand Marketing—this book offers a practical, no-nonsense guide to navigating the unique challenges of internet leads.

Buy on Amazon

The Advocate’s Playbook

by Angela H. Marshall

Release Date: June 26, 2025

With nearly 70% of formerly incarcerated individuals rearrested within three years, the need for effective, sustainable reentry solutions has never been more urgent. Angela H. Marshall, a nationally recognized reentry strategist and nonprofit leader, reveals insider insights, proven frameworks, and real-world tactics that help advocates and organizations turn passion into measurable impact.

Buy on Amazon

The Wild Genius: Raw Stories of Flow, Brilliance, and the Untamed Life in the Zone

by David Fagan & Others

Release Date: July 8, 2025

This isn’t just another book about success—it’s a collection of raw, unfiltered stories from creators, leaders, innovators, and everyday adventurers who chose to live untamed. Each of them discovered something powerful: their wild genius.

Buy on Amazon

Buyback Revolution

by Chris Schroeder

Release Date: July 3, 2025

Forget the “side hustle.” BuyBack Revolution is the ultimate business profit book and field manual for turning used electronics into daily, predictable income. Whether you’re brand new or burned out from inconsistent flipping, this guide gives you the systems, scripts, and strategies to build a real business with scalable cash flow.
